item.title: January & February '18: ReactiveOps, Career Goals, PyCaribbean
item.description: Long time no see. I’ve kept busy and also got great news. On the 5th of February, I started a job as a Site Reliability Engineer for ReactiveOps. I’m excited and grateful for this opportunity. Today is my first day as a Site Reliability Engineer for @ReactiveOps Very excited to be working with great people on Kubernetes! — Crismar Mejia (@CrismarMOz) February 5, 2018 Getting a job in the area was one of my career goals for this year.
